hero.welcomeBackSubtitle: What are we learning new today?
hero.tagline: Your tailored school, with history's masters
hero.description: Study math with Euclid, physics with Feynman, chemistry with Marie Curie. 22 historic Professors accompany you personally.

principles.welcome-to-school: Welcome to The School I Want, {name}!
principles.what-makes-us-special: Here is what makes us special
principles.accessible-learning-desc: Everyone has their own way of learning. Here we respect your pace and style.
principles.ai-teachers-desc: From Leonardo to Marie Curie, history's greatest geniuses will explain every subject to you.
principles.your-pace-desc: Coaches, virtual buddies, and tools designed for you. Learning is better together!
principles.no-judgment-desc: Quizzes, flashcards, mind maps, and XP to earn. Studying becomes an adventure!
principles.melissa-quote: Remember, {name}: there is no wrong way to learn. I am here to help you find yours!
principles.how-it-works-desc: Each Professor is an expert in their field. When you need help with math, ask Euclid. For English, there's Shakespeare! I'll help you choose the right Professor for every situation.

ready.prepared-for-you: I've prepared everything for you! Remember:
ready.always-talk: You can always talk to me - I'm here to help you with study methods
ready.choose-professor-desc: there's the right expert for every subject
ready.earn-xp: Earn XP - every lesson levels you up!

welcome-form.dont-worry: Don't worry if something seems difficult - together we'll always find a way to understand it!
welcome-form.tell-me-about-you: Tell me a bit about yourself, {name}!
